attributes.action: go to the queen and ask her to dissolve parliament and trigger a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to take this country back. With all that is going on we need to hold parliament to account we think it has overstepped the mark. This is probably the prime example where the country wants to take control of it's parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
